sentences.english: At the professional level, athletes from team to team are all fairly equal in talent.
sentences.chinese: 在專業水平，來自不同隊的運動員在天資上是平等的。

sentences.english: She has enough talent as a player to is a world beater.
sentences.chinese: 她很有天資，能成爲天下無敵的選手。

sentences.english: Smart and astute in nature, he will surely make great achievements in study.
sentences.chinese: 他天資靈慧，一定能夠學有所成。

sentences.english: I see children who have all sorts of talent, and then all of a sudden their grades start to plummet.
sentences.chinese: 我看到一些天資聰穎的孩子成績突然直線下降。

sentences.english: I do not have exceptional talent, it is not wise, I will be happy how?
sentences.chinese: 我沒有過人的天資，就得不到睿智，我怎麼會幸福？

sentences.english: Michael was an extremely talented, high-energy, hard working entertainer.
sentences.chinese: 米高是一名具備天資，幹勁十足，勤奮工作的藝人。
他是個有天資的音於封。

sentences.english: Besides, hard work can cultivate our talents.
sentences.chinese: 另外，努力工作也能培養我們的天資。

sentences.english: It’s no surprise that she shows an aptitude.
sentences.chinese: 她表現出她的天資並不令人感到奇怪。

sentences.english: Both Chinese and Indians are endowed with intelligence and a spirit of research.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個國家的人天資聰穎，富有研究精神。

sentences.english: But Schwartz argues that deliberate practice will almost always trump natural aptitude.
sentences.chinese: 但是施瓦澤指出刻意的練習會勝過天資。

sentences.english: Then Ford sacrificed all that muscular flair and created this.
sentences.chinese: 接着福特犧牲了所有肌肉的天資製造出了這個。

sentences.english: Helen was smart and learned quickly.
sentences.chinese: 海倫天資聰穎，學得很快。

sentences.english: Wit without learning is like a tree without fruit.
sentences.chinese: 有天資而無學識，好比樹木不結果實。

sentences.english: But this isn’t about natural aptitude, it’s about practice.
sentences.chinese: 但是這無關天資，這需要練習。

sentences.english: What are talent codes revealed by dermal ridges?
sentences.chinese: 皮紋透露哪些天資密碼？

definition: scholarship/high-level study/to do scholarly research/to pursue a high level of study
full of political wisdom (idiom)/politically astute/with encyclopedic experience of state policy
